title: Deepika Padukone Has Already Decided How She Will Raise Little DeepVeers With Ranveer Singh
text:
Apart from when Salman Khan is getting married, the million dollar question that fans want an answer to is when are Deepika Padukone and Ranveer starting a family.

In fact, the pregnancy rumours are already doing the rounds. Deepika, who is aware of the same, recently said that Ranveer and her are not ready to have a baby yet. But fans want to see mini DeepVeers soon, it seems.

Deeply, madly and head over heels in love with each other, Ranveer and Deepika will celebrate their first wedding anniversary in November itself.

Opening about having kids in future, Deepika Padukone said that she and her sister were raised by working parents and that’s how she would want her kids to be raised too. Here’ why!

Twitter

“My sister and I had two working parents who were still able to give every aspect of their lives, time, and dignity, whether it’s work or being home with us. I hope that when Ranveer and I start a family, we’re able to do it the way I experienced it as a child with my parents. Just rooted, wholesome and secure," she was quoted as saying by Harper's Bazaar US.

Instagram

When asked about not living together before marriage, Deepika replied, "If we had started living together earlier, then what would we be discovering later on? That’s what this year has been, living together and discovering each other. I like to say we made the best decision of our lives. I know people are cynical about marriage, but that hasn’t been our experience. We believe in the institution, and we’re enjoying every bit of it."

On work front, Deepika and Ranveer have wrapped up shooting for 83.
